snippet: A parliamentary committee rejected two provisions of an anorexia prevention measure but left open the possibility that an amended version could be approved later.
abstract: French lawmakers reject two provisions of anorexia prevention measure meant to protect professional fashion models, but leave open possibility of amended version.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and DAPHNE ANGLES

lead_paragraph: A parliamentary committee rejected two provisions of an anorexia prevention measure but left open the possibility that an amended version could be approved later.

headline.main: French Proposal on Models’ Weights Clashes With Labor Laws, Opponents Say
headline.print_headline: French Move on Model Size Faces Setback
